an4.78:1.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, dakkhina dayakato visujjhati, no patiggahakato;
an4.78:1.4: atthi, bhikkhave, dakkhina patiggahakato visujjhati, no dayakato;
an4.78:1.5: atthi, bhikkhave, dakkhina neva dayakato visujjhati, no patiggahakato;
an4.78:1.6: atthi, bhikkhave, dakkhina dayakato ceva visujjhati patiggahakato ca.
an4.78:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, dakkhina dayakato visujjhati, no patiggahakato?
an4.78:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, dayako hoti silava kalyanadhammo; patiggahaka honti dussila papadhamma.
an4.78:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, dakkhina dayakato visujjhati, no patiggahakato.
an4.78:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, dakkhina patiggahakato visujjhati, no dayakato?
an4.78:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, dayako hoti dussilo papadhammo; patiggahaka honti silavanto kalyanadhamma.
an4.78:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, dakkhina patiggahakato visujjhati, no dayakato.
an4.78:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, dakkhina neva dayakato visujjhati, no patiggahakato?
an4.78:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, dayako hoti dussilo papadhammo; patiggahakapi honti dussila papadhamma.
an4.78:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, dakkhina neva dayakato visujjhati, no patiggahakato.
an4.78:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, dakkhina dayakato ceva visujjhati patiggahakato ca?
an4.78:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, dayako hoti silava kalyanadhammo; patiggahakapi honti silavanto kalyanadhamma.
an4.78:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, dakkhina dayakato ceva visujjhati patiggahakato ca.
an4.78:5.4: Ima kho, bhikkhave, catasso dakkhina visuddhiyo”ti.
